name: 亚里士多德
bio_short: 古希腊哲学家和博学家，柏拉图的学生，亚历山大大帝的老师。他创立了一个影响深远的宇宙模型（地心说）和物理学体系，其思想在西方学术界统治了近两千年。
bio_short_en: A Greek philosopher and polymath. He was a student of Plato and the teacher of Alexander the Great. He established a comprehensive cosmological (geocentric) and physical system that dominated Western thought for almost two millennia.
